B

Bank - Class in core
Class implementing the Bank of the game
Bank(int) - Constructor for class core.Bank
Creates a Bank object with the number of players as parameter In particular, the values in the list used to keep track of the number of unpaid loans of all the players are initialized to $0.
BankTestScript - Class in <Unnamed>
Test script for Bank class
BankTestScript() - Constructor for class BankTestScript
 
BlueCard - Class in cards
Abstract class providing a skeletal implementation of blue card, which asks the player to either collect money from the Bank or pay money to another player or the Bank depending on whether the career specified in the card matches that of the player or of the other players.
BlueCard(String, String) - Constructor for class cards.BlueCard
Constructor with the specified name of this card and career as parameters
BlueCardDeck - Class in decks
Class implementing the deck containing the blue cards
BlueCardDeck() - Constructor for class decks.BlueCardDeck
Creates a blue card deck object
BlueSpace - Class in spaces
Class implementing a blue space.
BlueSpace(int, int) - Constructor for class spaces.BlueSpace
Creates a blue space object
BlueSpaceTestScript - Class in <Unnamed>
Test script for Blue Space class
BlueSpaceTestScript() - Constructor for class BlueSpaceTestScript
 
Board - Class in core
Class implementing the board, which consists of the colored spaces where the actual gameplay happens
Board() - Constructor for class core.Board
Creates a board object consisting of colored spaces: orange, blue, green, and magenta spaces (as well as start and end spaces) that dictate the layout and course of the gameplay
BoardTestScript - Class in <Unnamed>
Test script for Board class
BoardTestScript() - Constructor for class BoardTestScript
 
BonusPayday - Class in cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank
Class implementing a Bonus Payday action card, which asks the player to collect money from the Bank, equivalent to his/her current salary
BonusPayday() - Constructor for class cards.action_cards.collect_from_bank.BonusPayday
Creates a Bonus Payday action card object
BonusPaydayTestScript - Class in <Unnamed>
Test script for BonusPayday class
BonusPaydayTestScript() - Constructor for class BonusPaydayTestScript
 
borrowLoan(int, int) - Method in class core.GameMaster
Allows the player (identified via ID number) to borrow the specified number of loans from the Bank
borrowLoan(Bank, int) - Method in class core.Player
Borrows the specified number of loans from the Bank
BorrowLoans - Class in gui
Class implementing a BorrowLoans window as part of the GUI for taking loans from the bank
BorrowLoans() - Constructor for class gui.BorrowLoans
Creates a BorrowLoans object
BorrowLoansController - Class in controllers
Class providing the controller for the processes related to borrowing loans
BorrowLoansController(BorrowLoans, MainScreen, GameMaster) - Constructor for class controllers.BorrowLoansController
Creates a controller object with the graphical user interface related to borrowing loans and the game master as parameters
BuyAHouse - Class in spaces.magenta_spaces

BuyAHouse(int, int) - Constructor for class spaces.magenta_spaces.BuyAHouse
